content.question: The final paragraph (lines 69-73) underscores which of the following implied ideas?

choices.label: Lincoln defended the interests of different classes of people.
Lincoln was a shrewd observer of people.
Lincoln relied on humor to make serious arguments.
Lincoln was unattractive but highly charismatic.

content.answer: Lincoln was a shrewd observer of people.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
